Question
========

In the population of psychology students, the variable height has a normal distribution with mean 177.6 cm and standard deviation of 5.0 cm. In a *random sample* of 25 students, what is the probability of finding a mean height that is less than 176.6?

Answerlist
----------

* 0.159.
* 0.371.
* 0.421.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.159.: Correct .
* Incorrect
* 0.421.: Incorrect
